Reviews.Title: Intended to be a temporary replacement. Now it's permanent. Best phone I've ever had!
Reviews.Author: kali dinh
Reviews.Content: Pros: Got this phone to replace my broken iPhone. I intended it to be a temporary replacement but I'm keeping it! I love the sleek look of my old phone but definitely prefer android. There are way more apps and just freedoms in general. I play games, listen to music, social networking, etc.  My friends always ask where I got it. Also works with any SIM card as long as its GSM. Great battery life too.Cons: Ordering from over seas takes forever. If you can find an American dealer, order from them.

Reviews.Title: Definitely the best unbranded phone on Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Best phone for the price.  Durable, fast, and runs tons of apps.  Saved so much money buying unbranded instead of  branded.
